```supercollider





/*

from two roots

eine algorithmische Computermusik Komposition basiert auf zwei mathematischen Zahlen (Wurzeln)

*/




2**(1/12); // 2.pow(1/12) -> traditionelle gleichstufige stimmung 


5**(1/25); // 5.pow(1/25) -> gleichstufige stimmungssystem von karlheinzstockhausen "studie ii" (1954) -> 1.0594630943593





//2**(1/12) count 56 times
(
fork{
	var count, factor;
	count = 0;
	56.do{
	 count = count + 1;
	 factor = 2**(count/12); //Wurzel
	["count: " ++ count ++ ";  " ++ "factor: " ++ factor].postln;
	factor.linexp(1, 56, 1.0, 5.6).wait;

}
};
)




// 5**(1/25) count 50 times
(
fork{
	var count, factor;
	count = 0;
	50.do{
	 count = count + 1;
	 factor = 5**(count/25); //Wurzel
	["count: " ++ count ++ ";  " ++ "factor: " ++ factor].postln;
	factor.linexp(1, 50,1.0,5.0).wait;
}
};
)



// 2**(1/12) collect 56 times as array
Post<<(1..56).collect{|i| 2**(i/12)};
/*[ 1.0594630943593, 1.1224620483094, 1.1892071150027, 1.2599210498949, 1.33483985417, 1.4142135623731, 1.4983070768767, 1.5874010519682, 1.6817928305074, 1.7817974362807, 1.8877486253634, 2.0, 2.1189261887186, 2.2449240966187, 2.3784142300054, 2.5198420997897, 2.6696797083401, 2.8284271247462, 2.9966141537534, 3.1748021039364, 3.3635856610149, 3.5635948725614, 3.7754972507268, 4.0, 4.2378523774372, 4.4898481932375, 4.7568284600109, 5.0396841995795, 5.3393594166801, 5.6568542494924, 5.9932283075067, 6.3496042078728, 6.7271713220297, 7.1271897451227, 7.5509945014535, 8.0, 8.4757047548744, 8.979696386475, 9.5136569200218, 10.079368399159, 10.67871883336, 11.313708498985, 11.986456615013, 12.699208415746, 13.454342644059, 14.254379490245, 15.101989002907, 16.0, 16.951409509749, 17.95939277295, 19.027313840044, 20.158736798318, 21.357437666721, 22.62741699797, 23.972913230027, 25.398416831491 ]-> Post*/



// 5**(1/25) collect 50 times as array
Post<<((1..50).collect{|i| 5**(i/25)});
/* [ 1.0664949422084, 1.137411461756, 1.2130435711726, 1.293704833334, 1.3797296614612, 1.4714747055632, 1.5693203310708, 1.6736721957917, 1.7849629317266, 1.9036539387159, 2.0302372973555, 2.1652378091124, 2.3092151720968, 2.462766301512, 2.6265278044038, 2.8011786189663, 2.9874428293497, 3.1860926676382, 3.3979517154433, 3.6238983183885, 3.8648692276387, 4.1218634835735, 4.3959465577044, 4.6882547700101, 5.0, 5.3324747110418, 5.6870573087801, 6.0652178558632, 6.4685241666699, 6.8986483073061, 7.3573735278162, 7.8466016553538, 8.3683609789586, 8.9248146586332, 9.5182696935794, 10.151186486778, 10.826189045562, 11.546075860484, 12.31383150756, 13.132639022019, 14.005893094831, 14.937214146749, 15.930463338191, 16.989758577216, 18.119491591942, 19.324346138194, 20.609317417867, 21.979732788522, 23.44127385005, 25.0 ]
*/

// die berechneten ergebnisse als parametersreihe auf
// frequenzen
// tondauer
// pause bis nächste*n aktion/klang

//frequenz

340*25 //8500
340*25.39 //8632.6


//result from 12√2 counting 56 times, as "wait time", how long?
(1..56).sum{|i| 2**(i/12)};
//-> 434.71034382385 -> 7.25 min

//result from 25√5 counting 50 times, as "wait time", how long?
(1..50).sum{|i| 5**(i/25)};
//-> 384.92970687596 -> 6.41666 min

```
